item.title: About
item.description: This is the home of the Europa School Español-English Class of 2016.

item.title: Books this week
item.description: Hola a todos, This week we have seen two new characters in Letrilandia which sounds the same in Spanish (b and v) the children are taking Letrilandia home to read them with you. (audio attached, pag 45 and 47). In the yellow book you will see different words written with b and v, please try to write with them as last week you did with y and ll. You can read them again (y and ll) and continue reading until pag 51.
